flavorText: When sorely wounded or tired, Urza would often retreat to the workshops of his apprentices. They were greatly amazed at how much better he looked each time he took a sip of water.
name: Urza's Chalice
originalText: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: This will not trigger on its own casting. It must be on the battlefield at the time the artifact is cast.

text: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
